5. CONCLUSION
Additional Information :
Among the magnificient structure of the “Shatabadi Bhavan” and “Shatabadi Stambh” commemorating the
“Eternal Legacy” of excellence in Technical Education, Harcourt Butler Technical University, Kanpur (HBTU,
Kanpur) celebrated its 100 years of establishment on 25th November, 2021 in the benign presence of Hon’ble
President of India along with Hon'ble Chancellor and Governor of Uttar Pradesh, Hon’ble Minister,
